title: Web3 Company Redacted Raises US$10 Million In An Investment Round Co-Led By The Spartan Group, With Participation From Saison Capital, Animoca Brands, and Polygon Ventures | Entrepreneur
description: Harnessing the power of blockchain and artificial intelligence (AI), Redacted is building an ecosystem of products to form an "entertainment datasphere," where Web3 users can do what they love most- play, trade, watch, and get rewarded.
